title: Episode 1 - Don't Call It A Comeback
description: On today's show, Todd intros the the new look Heartland Radio (2.0) and welcomes Pat, Nick, Digs, Ty, Connor, Zito, and Evan as they dive into some hilarious stories in the news. They cover strippers coming into Chinese kindergarten classrooms, a guy getting a 23 inch sex toy stuck up his butt, decide who they'd either buy a shot for, or take a shot at, answer some listener questions, and dive into the notes section on their phones. Closing out the episode is a standup clip from comedian Brendon Walsh. We're starting back at zero so SUBSCRIBE, RATE, & REVIEW, and come have a good time.
dc:creator: The Pod
